extendedInfo.description: Access expound content on the go! Our mobile app brings the study to your iPhone or Androidâ¢ device so you can take expound media and study guides with you. This tool will help you come prepared and keeps expound study questions and archives at your fingertips!The app provides you with thought-provoking questions contained in our weekly study guides, allows you to submit questions to Pastor Skip during the live expound service, and provides access to the free expound media archive files.Features include:- Access to the weekly study guides - Submit questions to Skip during the live expound service - Access the free expound media archive files

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I have been using the usb drives to go through the bible.  It seems I have caught up to you guys. The only compm aint I have is that I wish we moved on a new lesson each day. I\'m loving this study. I know things I never dreamed I would know...but mainly....I\'m learning how to better have a relationship with a holy God!
reviews.author: Lisa Greve

reviews.comment: Worked fine til update. Now force close right away
reviews.author: A Google User
